channel.title: Aeron's Tiny Blog.

item.title: Conda环境中 Tensorflow 与 CPU 和 GPU 的问题
item.description:
首先

这两天一直在解决 conda(我用的是miniconda) 环境中 Tensorflow 使用 CPU 和 GPU 的问题, 主要是关于 GPU.

这一篇文章想对这些问题总结, 攥写一篇心得.

放心, 不是网络上各种文章的copy, 我反而希望你是在尝试了主流文章后无法解决的情况下看到这篇文章.

当然有引用的内容会注明来源(没什么引用,纯个人经验), 但是我相信这篇文章可以解决你所碰到的相同的问题.

  • 1. conda环境
  • 2. 宿主机外部 CUDA & cudnn
  • 3. conda虚拟环境内部 CUDA & cudnn
  • 定位问题并解决问题
  • 若你只有5分钟, 那么止步于此吧, 以下是进阶内容
  • 你会碰到一个问题
  • 4. pip install tensorflow
  • 如果你想指定 CPU/GPU
  • 经过测试的构建配置
  • Refer

item.title: Previews problem while running hugo server
item.description:
What happened

There’s some operation caused 404 page while running hugo server .

Once you changed categories and tags during running hugo server , browser’ll jumped to 404 page after you click the changed categories and tags.

Multiple pictures contained

item.title: Kinda love(French version) - Olivier Dion
item.description: This songs have both English and French version. This audio is French version. If you are using Youtube Music , you can switch to Video to listen English version. Youtube link

I got thanatophobia. Started in 2018, when I was just 16. It stayed with me through the years. And continuing for the rest of my life, until I died. However, I will not give up fighting it, and I will continue to do so for the rest of my life. We are born with nothing, and we leave alone. In this short life, the most precious thing is the journey of life itself.

item.title: Hu Shi's letter to his son
item.description: Hu Shi’s letter to his son: I nurture you, not a kindness, but a biological instinct caused by blood; therefore, since I am unkind to you, you do not need to repay me. Instead, I want to thank you because my life is more complete because of your participation. I just happened to be your father, you just happened to be my daughter and my son, I’m not your prequel, and you’re not my sequel.

item.title: Edward Snowden About Privacy
item.description: Arguing that you don’t care about the right to privacy because you have nothing to hide is no different than saying you don’t care about free speech because you have nothing to say.
